plugins.cameraPermission: Allow KF app to access your camera to take gear photos
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow KF app to access your microphone for video recording

plugins.photosPermission: Allow KF app to access your photos to select gear images
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow KF app to access your camera to take gear photos

plugins.networkPermission: Allow KF app to access your network for multiplayer functionality

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow KF app to access your camera to take gear photos
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow KF app to access your microphone for video recording
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow KF app to access your photos to select gear images
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Allow KF app to discover other devices on your local network for multiplayer functionality
